Structs/SlackLogHandler/Icon.html#/s:12L.name: emoji(_:)
Structs/SlackLogHandler/Icon.html#/s:12L.abstract: An emoji code string to use in place of the default icon.

Structs/SlackLogHandler/Icon.html#/s:12L.name: url(_:)
Structs/SlackLogHandler/Icon.html#/s:12L.abstract: An icon image URL to use in place of the default icon.

Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.name: globalLogLevelThreshold
Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.abstract: The global log level threshold that determines when to send log output to Slack.

Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.name: label
Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.abstract: The log label for the log handler.

Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.name: colorScheme
Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.abstract: The color scheme is used to determine the color of a Slack message for a log level.

Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.name: init(label:webhookURL:channel:username:icon:colorScheme:)
Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.abstract: Creates a SlackLogHandler for sending Logger output directly to Slack.

Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.name: ColorScheme
Structs/SlackLogHandler.html#/s:12Loggin.abstract: A color scheme is used to determine the color of a Slack message for a log level.

Structs/SlackLogHandler/Color.html.name: Color
Structs/SlackLogHandler/Color.html.abstract: A color represented by a hex string.

Structs/SlackLogHandler.html.abstract: SlackLogHandler is an implementation of LogHandler for sending
